source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Relax with the mellow Watercolor Workshop videos

visible_instructors.job_title: Mellow out with the Watercolor Workshop
visible_instructors.name: Carol
visible_instructors.title: Carol LaChiusa

items.headline: Carol LaChiusa's WaterColor Workshop is a great place to relax and learn
objectives_summary: Relaxation and or a basic level of Watercolor painting

items.title: Learn To Paint This New Zealand Landscape Scene In Oils
items.headline: Paint this beautiful New Zealand landscape using oils or acrylics. Perfect for beginners to intermediates.
objectives_summary: Create a simple landscape painting using oils.

items.title: Woodworking for Beginners
items.headline: Projects for Beginners
objectives_summary: How to build simple woodworking projects
About the tools used and what they are intended for
How to design their own projects

items.title: Painting a miniature figure PART 2
items.headline: 54mm - Fantasy - Intermediate level - 2º Part
objectives_summary: Paint a 54mm (1:32 scale) miniatures figure
Color theory (light, base and shadow)
How to paint eyes, different leather, silver, hair, strap and details

items.title: How to Paint a Realistic Robin Bird in Watercolour
items.headline: Learn to paint wildlife in watercolor!
objectives_summary: In this video I will guide you from start to finish on how to paint this delightful Robin in watercolour.
I will teach you a variety of techniques, foundation washes, detailed layers, blending, adding life to the painting, considering form, mixing colour, painting detailed legs and feet,
how to paint wood, wet in wet, dry brush, fine detail brush work, layering of washes, using watercolour white paint, and much, much more!

items.title: Learn how to crochet
items.headline: Crochet for beginners
objectives_summary: You will learn everything about crocheting - from how to hold the hook till making flawless stitches

items.title: My 7 color watercolor palette sorted specially for beginners

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Walker

items.headline: Are you a complete beginner in watercolor? Are you confused? Don't be! This course will explain all you need to know.
objectives_summary: How to make beautiful watercolor paintings using just 7 colors

items.title: Easy watercolor painting- night sky galaxy manga portrait
items.headline: Upgrade your watercolor skills and paint a manga portrait with a galaxy northern lights background now!
objectives_summary: Painting a watercolor galaxy pattern
Coloring a stylized manga portrait from line art template
Extra lesson: paint a watercolor galaxy nebula hair

items.title: Free Hand Drawing - Beginners
items.headline: Let the art flow
objectives_summary: Use paper and pencil to draw their ideas to communicate with others
Shaping ideas from mind to simple illustrations

items.title: Creative Watercolours Near Beginners
items.headline: The next step in getting creative with watercolours.
objectives_summary: Apply paint in small areas of wet-in-wet with control.
Understand complementary colours and how to use them.
Understand Aerial Perspective and choose paints to demonstrate it's effect.

items.title: Watercolor Layering for Beginners: Painting cherry tutorial
items.headline: Painting Cherries in watercolor using a layering technique for more vibrancy of the subject
objectives_summary: Watercolor layering techniques
How to paint cherries in watercolor

items.title: Free hand poppies,Free style watercolor Free sample course.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Walker

items.headline: Try this Free style poppies course for free and I will teach you just how easy it is to get superb results in watercolor
objectives_summary: You will learn how to paint poppies in freestyle freehand watercolor painting.
You will see how I mix colors on the paper
You will learn how to fill the page with color

items.title: An Acrylic Artist's Guide to What Supplies to Buy & Why
items.headline: End the Supply Confusion - A Guide to What Acrylic Painting Supplies to Choose When You Enter an Art Store.
objectives_summary: This course will take the confusion out of the huge selection of acrylic art supplies - what paints, brushes, surfaces and other things you might need for your specific art project.  Don't spend a lot of money on supplies you might not need.  This fun look at what you should or should not buy and why is designed to help you make up your mind about what supplies are right for your project and your pocketbook. Presented with samples and humor to make it easy to understand.

items.title: The Joy Of Acrylic Painting: Morning Sunrise
items.headline: Innovative acrylic painting
objectives_summary: The satisfaction of completing an acrylic painting and the confidence to continue further

items.title: Watercolor Manga Portrait Painting Class for Beginners
items.headline: Easy and fun way to watercolor  -  "Pisces Dreamer" Manga Portrait
objectives_summary: Coloring a stylized manga portrait from line art template
Painting with watercolors

items.title: Easy Watercolor Iris Flower Painting with Galaxy Background
items.headline: Paint watercolor iris flowers - beginner friendly techniques (free downloadable coloring page templates included)
objectives_summary: How to paint the Iris flower from a-z in an easy way
How to create an effortless galaxy background
How to create fun watercolor effects with just a straw
